cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)
mng: clock, o'clock, time as measured in hours and minutes, bell

exm.mng: bell tower, campanile, clock tower, Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
Zhong Kui (mythological figure, supposed to drive away evil spirits), (fig.) a person with the courage to fight against evil
